name: Leadership
description: I have successfully led team projects in various courses ranging from design to engineering to programming.

name: Academic Achievement
description: I graduated as Dux in high-school, and have maintained a GPA in the top 5% of students. I have earned various academic awards, such as achieving the Faculty Dean's Commendation four times.

name: Interest and Motivation
description: I have shown strong interest in extra-curricular pursuits by learning more languages and difficult concepts. As seen in the projects sections, I love to take on challenges. This website is only one example of that.

name: Experience
description: My workplace experience includes 2 years as an intern for Agility Applications, a finance software company. I also work as a tutor for university programming courses, and briefly as a freelance website builder.

name: Bilingual - English & Dutch
description: I grew up speaking Dutch/Flemish, and learned English at 11 years old. I still regularly speak both languages, although I prefer English.

name: Volunteering & Clubs
description: For 2 years on a weekly basis I assisted at a retirement home, working with dementia patients. I am involved in several university clubs, such as the Computer Society and Electrical Engineering Society. These clubs hold interesting presentations which I attend.
